Package org.middleheaven.logging

Interface Summary
LoggingConfigurator

LoggingEventParametersCollector

Class Summary
BasicConfigurator  
BroadcastLoggingService Service that allows for logging broadcast.
CompositeLogBook  
ConfigurableLogListener Responds to LoggingEvents in a configurable maner.
ConsoleLogBook  
ListLogBookWriter Stores all LoggingEvents written to it in a List.
LogBook  
LogBookFactory Factory of Logger based on the LoggingService.
LogBookWriter Writes the LoggingEvent on to a book media.
Logger Provides a convinent set of method to create and send LoggingEvent to the LoggingService.
LoggingConfiguration  
LoggingEvent Represents an event to be logged.

Enum Summary
LoggingLevel LoggingLevel is used to determine if a LogEvent should be logged given a determinaed level for the book or writer reciving the event.
